title: Warhammer Quest v1.1.5 Unlocked
description:
If you're not familiar with this game, it's a digital recreation of a classic Games Workshop boardgame in which you take control of a group of hardy adventurers.

You'll complete quests; smash goblins' heads into pulp; and learn a variety of spells and special moves as you work your way through the dungeons of the Warhammer world.

All the while, you're earning chunks of gold, which you need to spend on training, new equipment, and bandages to bind your wounds.

Warhammer Quest was developed by Rodeo Games, a.k.a. the team behind the Silver Award-winning Hunters 2, and the blend of violence, swords, sorcery, and strategy is an alluring one.

At review, we described Warhammer Quest as "a fun, fast-paced dungeon-crawler that does its inspiration justice" and promptly handed Rodeo Games a Silver Award.

The dungeon crawler is one of video gamingâ€™s oldest, most venerable genres â€” itâ€™s difficult to reinvent something with so much history and precedent behind it. Itâ€™s probably for the best that Warhammer Quest doesnâ€™t try.

Warhammer Quest doesnâ€™t revolutionize the dungeon crawler. Any gamer who hasnâ€™t Rip Van Winkled through the last couple of decades has delved more virtual dungeons than have ever actually existed in history. Thereâ€™s little in this game that you havenâ€™t seen elsewhere, but youâ€™ve rarely seen that stuff assembled into such an elegant, sophisticated package.

Warhammer Quest doesnâ€™t revolutionize the dungeon crawler â€” it elevates it.

 6 additional Heroes
 Fight the Skaven in a huge expansion
 40+ hours of gameplay (including expansions)
 Whispersync game saves
 GameCircle achievements

What's in this version : (Updated : Nov 6, 2015)
